author: Daniel Greene
description:
Inspired by Duplee’s “Seven Levels of Writer” video (watch it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C1f8_-8GU7I&ab_channel=duplee), I decided to make a fantasy-focused version of the concept.

From con artist authors to the masters shaping the genre, I break down seven distinct levels of fantasy writer — exploring what makes each tier unique, examples of who might fit where, and the strengths and pitfalls of each stage.

title: The Seven Levels of Fantasy
